title: Zoom API in R
text: goal zoomer make easy interact Zoom API R.

title: Authenticate with an API — .api_authenticate
text: client Zoom OAuth client created zoom_client(). cache_key authenticating multiple users using client, use key differentiate users. scopes character vector allowed scopes, "recording:read". force logical indicating whether force refresh token. refresh_token refresh token associated client.

Construct an OAuth client — .api_client
text: client_id Zoom OAuth App client ID. recommend save environment variable, ZOOM_CLIENT_ID. client_secret Zoom OAuth App client secret. recommend save environment variable, ZOOM_CLIENT_SECRET.

Authenticate a request with OAuth2.0 — .api_req_authenticate
text: request httr2::request(). client Zoom OAuth client created zoom_client(). scopes character vector allowed scopes, "recording:read". cache_disk access token cached disk? Cached tokens encrypted automatically deleted 30 days creation. See httr2::req_oauth_auth_code(). cache_key authenticating multiple users using client, use key differentiate users. token Zoom API OAuth token, access_token string token. recommend instead supply client, case appropriate token located possible.

title: Is a token expired? — .api_token_is_expired
text: logical scalar indicating whether token expired.

text: parameters used multiple authentication functions. Define consistent.

title: OAuth parameters — .oauth-parameters
text: cache_disk access token cached disk? Cached tokens encrypted automatically deleted 30 days creation. See httr2::req_oauth_auth_code(). cache_key authenticating multiple users using client, use key differentiate users. client Zoom OAuth client created zoom_client(). client_id Zoom OAuth App client ID. recommend save environment variable, ZOOM_CLIENT_ID. client_secret Zoom OAuth App client secret. recommend save environment variable, ZOOM_CLIENT_SECRET. force logical indicating whether force refresh token. refresh_token refresh token associated client. request httr2::request(). scopes character vector allowed scopes, "recording:read". token Zoom API httr2::oauth_token().

title: OAuth request authentication documentation — .oauth-req-auth
text: token Zoom API OAuth token, access_token string token. recommend instead supply client, case appropriate token located possible.

Zoom request OAuth authentication — .zoom_req_authenticate
text: function main way authentication handled package. tries find token non-interactively possible, bothers user necessary.

title: Zoom request OAuth authentication — .zoom_req_authenticate
code: .zoom_req_authenticate(   request,   client = zoom_client(),   scopes = "recording:read",   cache_disk = getOption("zoom.cache_disk", FALSE),   cache_key = getOption("zoom.cache_key", NULL),   token = NULL )

title: Zoom request OAuth authentication — .zoom_req_authenticate
text: request httr2::request(). client Zoom OAuth client created zoom_client(). scopes character vector allowed scopes, "recording:read". cache_disk access token cached disk? Cached tokens encrypted automatically deleted 30 days creation. See httr2::req_oauth_auth_code(). cache_key authenticating multiple users using client, use key differentiate users. token Zoom API OAuth token, access_token string token. recommend instead supply client, case appropriate token located possible.

what: Authenticate with a Zoom OAuth client — zoom_authenticate
title: Authenticate with a Zoom OAuth client — zoom_authenticate
text: Load generate Zoom OAuth token use functions package. primary use function cache values early script (user can walk away). Otherwise functions package prompt authentication needed. values cached, rest package use default client.

title: Authenticate with a Zoom OAuth client — zoom_authenticate
code: zoom_authenticate(   client = zoom_client(),   cache_key = getOption("zoom.cache_key", NULL),   scopes = "recording:read",   force = FALSE,   refresh_token = NULL )

title: Authenticate with a Zoom OAuth client — zoom_authenticate
text: client Zoom OAuth client created zoom_client(). cache_key authenticating multiple users using client, use key differentiate users. scopes character vector allowed scopes, "recording:read". force logical indicating whether force refresh token. refresh_token refresh token associated client.

title: Authenticate with a Zoom OAuth client — zoom_authenticate
Visit Zoom Created Apps — zoom_browse_app_management
text: Launch Zoom "Created Apps" page (can configure OAuth 2.0 Clients). Navigate "Develop > Build App" app, choose "OAuth". Set "OAuth allow list" "http://localhost:8888". also give app allowed scopes. configure app, copy/paste Client ID Client Secret ZOOM_CLIENT_ID ZOOM_CLIENT_ID environment variables. recommend placing environment variables .Renviron file.

title: Visit Zoom Created Apps — zoom_browse_app_management
code: zoom_app_mgmt_url <- zoom_browse_app_management() # Copy/paste values from your client. Sys.setenv(ZOOM_CLIENT_ID = "raNdOMletTeRS") Sys.setenv(ZOOM_CLIENT_SECRET = "RanDomleTTerSandNumb3rs")
